name: Clear Men Cool Sport Menthol Shampoo
description: Engineered Specifically for men. Nutrium Oil Complex. Nourishes 3 Scalp layers deep. Targets Dandruff at the source. Boost scalp health to increase natural resistance against dandruff & scalp problems. Cooling Mint for re Energize the scalp. Reenergized and deeply nourishes the scalp. Helps to increase the natural resistance against dandruff, itch and remove grace. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
